rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0001
rows.name: By the way, where'd you go, dumping the work on Nagi?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0002
rows.name: Hey now, the BLADE Commander is busy too, y'know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0003
rows.name: Busy enough to leave scouting new members to someone else?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0004
rows.name:
You can talk, even though you were all gung-ho,
saying "Okay, I'll persuade them!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0005
rows.name: Is that so?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Was that so?[ST:wide ]―
I'll leave the rest to you, Commander.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0007
rows.name: Uncle Nagi totally ran away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Unbelievable! To think both the Secretary of Defense
and the Blade Commander would show up together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Weren't you looking happy yourself,
saying you'd found a promising newbie?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0010
rows.name: Was I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Come on now, don't be so cold.
Are you one of those 'tsundere' types?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0011_m
rows.name:
Come on now, don't be so cold.
Are you one of those 'tsundere' types?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0011_f
rows.name:
Come on now, don't be so cold.
Are you one of those 'tsundere' types?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Well, your slang is
not something I understand well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0013
rows.name:
More importantly, is that the newbie?
Looking nice, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0014
rows.name: This is BLADE's Commander, Vandham.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0015
rows.name: Originally I was the Chief Engineer on the White Whale, but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Since arriving on Mira, by some twist of fate,
I've been the BLADE Commander.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0017
rows.name: Nice to meet ya, newbie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0018
rows.name:
So what's your business?
You didn't just come here to see the newbie's face, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0019
rows.name: You can tell?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0020
rows.name: Of course. You're not that type of person.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Okay, let's get to it. Two things:
Union affiliation and a mission request.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0010
rows.name: Show Interest

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask in detail about the mission.

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0020
rows.name: Question

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask what a Union is.

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0022
rows.name: Don't be in such a hurry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0023
rows.name:
I get that you want to run around freely already, but
you can't even do that until you pick your Union.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Once I'm done explaining the Unions,
you'll understand the mission too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0025
rows.name: Most people living in NLA, as members of BLADE[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0026
rows.name:
are involved in exploring Mira and maintaining public order in NLA,
just like Nagi said.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0027
rows.name:
There are eight different divisions in all,
and each one has its own branch within BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0028
rows.name: Those are the Unions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0029
rows.name:
You too will have to belong
to the Union that matches your aptitude.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0030
rows.name: Let's start with the Pathfinder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0031
rows.name: What you had done for your first mission[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0032
rows.name:
is the Union primarily in charge of
Data Probe installation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0033
rows.name:
We're beginners who don't know anything
about this planet, Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0034
rows.name: That's why installing Data Probes[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0035
rows.name:
and expanding FrontierNet,
helps us to learn more about this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0036
rows.name:
The more FrontierNet expands,
the more varied information comes in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0037
rows.name: Based on that information, we can safely exist on this planet[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0038
rows.name:
and find the way to live
a stable life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0039
rows.name:
Besides, expanding FrontierNet is essential
for finding the Life Point, our main objective.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0040
rows.name: Okay, next up—Interceptors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0041
rows.name:
You've already met Irina and Gwin, right?
It's the Union those guys belong to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0042
rows.name: Interceptors have one main duty:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0043
rows.name:
Protecting NLA residents from the threat
of Mira's native creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0044
rows.name: This Union might be the busiest one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0045
rows.name: Guarding survey teams, protecting VIPs[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0046
rows.name:
Depending on the situation, rescuing NLA residents is also
part of this Union's duties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0047
rows.name: Next are the Avalanche.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0048
rows.name:
Remember Doug? The one piloting
in the Doll flight test?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0049
rows.name: That's the Union he belongs to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0050
rows.name:
If Interceptor is defense,
Avalanche handles offense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0051
rows.name: That said, it's not like they just attack blindly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0052
rows.name:
Taking down particularly dangerous creatures on Mira
is this Union's main mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0053
rows.name: Next are Testament,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0054
rows.name:
searching for and recovering the wreckage of the White Whale
that scattered across Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0055
rows.name:
And one more thing, recovering battlefield
mementos is also this Union's main mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0056
rows.name:
Recovering remains isn't a mission you want often, but
the fact is, it happens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0057
rows.name:
For us, still unfamiliar with this planet
and unable to produce anything ourselves,[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0058
rows.name:
everything from Earth that the White Whale
carried is a precious item.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0059
rows.name:
Searching for the Life Point is also
this Union's responsibility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0060
rows.name: Next: Collepedians,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0061
rows.name:
going ahead of any other Union
to various places on Mira[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0062
rows.name:
Surveying those places and recovering materials and such
is their main mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0063
rows.name:
Walking in places no one's seen yet sounds nice, but
it's two sides of the same coin as the threat of native creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0064
rows.name: Next are Landbanker.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0065
rows.name:
Securing resources and collecting minerals is their main mission.
Resources are vital for survival, after all.

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0066
rows.name:
Even though we loaded all the essentials,
supplies are limited.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0067
rows.name: We have to find substitutes for water, fuel,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0068
rows.name: parts and tools for repairing NLA and Dolls[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0069
rows.name:
Even frying pans - we have to learn to make them
using materials from Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0070
rows.name: That's why they spend their days collecting and researching.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0071
rows.name: Next up: Arms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0072
rows.name:
The Arms Companies develop
all the Doll and Inner weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0073
rows.name: It's the Union whose main mission is supporting them[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0074
rows.name: by finding things that could provide hints for weapon development.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0075
rows.name: They also conduct tests on prototypes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0076
rows.name: Finally, the Companions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0077
rows.name:
It's the Union whose main mission is
solving problems among NLA residents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0078
rows.name:
From mediating residents' quarrels to searching for lost cats,
the requests from residents cover a wide range.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0079
rows.name:
Dealing with all of that,
it might be close to a jack-of-all-trades, so to speak.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0080
rows.name:
You might think it's too plain, but
precisely because Companions exists,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0081
rows.name:
the other Unions can focus all their energy
on external affairs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0082
rows.name: That's it for the Union explanations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0083
rows.name: Finally, about the Union you'll eventually join,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0084
rows.name:
whichever you pick,
your freedom won't be restricted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0085
rows.name:
Even if you belong to Companion,
you can still go hunt native creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0086
rows.name:
Even as an Avalancher,
you can work hard solving NLA residents' problems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0087
rows.name:
Although it's not really recommended,
it's also possible to change your affiliated Union later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0088
rows.name:
It's fine to choose without stressing about it at first.
So? Do you get it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0030
rows.name: Yes

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod, indicating you understand perfectly.

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0040
rows.name: No

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0041
rows.name: Look away nervously.

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0089
rows.name: Since it's important, I'll explain again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0090
rows.name: Okay then, please choose your Union.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0051
rows.name: Choose your Union.

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0060
rows.name: Hesitate

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask to hear the Union explanation again.

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0091
rows.name: So that's your decision?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0070
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0071
rows.name: Look Elma in the eyes and nod.

rows.label: xs03010100_JNK0080
rows.name: Reconsider

rows.label: xs03010100_SEL0081
rows.name: Choose a different Union.

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0092
rows.name: Alright! All procedures complete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0092_2
rows.name:
With this, you're officially a member of BLADE.
Good luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0093
rows.name: Welcome to BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03010100_MSG0094
rows.name: Let's do our best together![ST:wait ]
